body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Brookside Hotels customer service. My name is Jeffrey Brooks and I will be assisting you today. May I please have your name?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Shirley Carter.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Shirley. How may I assist you today? May I have your room number for reference?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My room number is three five two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Shirley. Can you also provide me with the email address associated with your booking?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, my email address is s.carter@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for the information, Shirley. I will look into the issue with the clean towels in room 352 and follow up with you shortly.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I appreciate your help. I didn't expect this issue.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: We aim to provide the best service possible, Shirley. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. Do you have any other concerns I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that was all. Thank you for your assistance.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Shirley. Thank you for contacting us. Have a wonderful day!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Shirley. Thank you for contacting us.
